title: Tycho-221 Heist
summary: Jax is stranded on Tycho-221 after a key ship component was stolen. He's tracking down leads in a scrapyard.

title: Waking in Krellar's Drift
summary: Jax Varn wakes up with no memory of how he arrived at Krellar’s Drift, a smuggler outpost. Checking his inventory and credits, he realizes he has limited resources. With only 5 credits and no new messages on his communicator, he's left to piece together recent events and find his missing contact, 'Sable.'

title: Awakening in the Verdant Wreck
summary: Doran Tirdon awakens in 'The Verdant Wreck,' an abandoned science vessel overgrown with plants. He inspects a nearby laboratory filled with flickering lights, old equipment, and a mysterious passkey badge. With an uneasy feeling and partial memory loss, he prepares to explore the ship's dark corridors.
